details: Planned features not yet implemented in this version.
todo: jsdoc markdown: exclude leading asterisks from embedded code blocks
jsdoc markdown: exclude leading asterisks from headings
fix folding for functions with multiline arguments and uniline `) {`

details: Use markdown grammar within jsdoc comments.
For example, @param uses the format: `@param {types} name description`. param, types, and name are all highlighted.

It seems useful to have some structured higher-level documentation describing the current version. It should not be a direct copy of git commit history, but rather offer a more flexible and prioritized summary of changes. An entry doesn't have to have all the same attributes or use the same attribute types as other entries.
